attributes.action: petition for training in childcare and safety
attributes.additional_details:
As a Nanny that looks after her Grandchildren, I am really concerned about foods/toys that can choke and harm our precious little ones.
 I feel very strongly that a short course/training session on how to deal with common situations regarding the well being of children should be offered during pregnancy.
 This could be done thru midwife, doctor, hospital and or Health visitor checks.
 Pregnant ladies and Dads are invited to attend hospital tours and breathing classes. Surely this is as, if not more important.
 I'm sure there are many of us that would benefit from this and therefore save children's lives in the process.
 A petition would maybe force the health service to address this.
 Anyone feel the same about this?
attributes.background: I feel very strongly that a short course/training session on how to deal with common situations regarding the well being of children should be offered during pregnancy
